name: Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment
about: What it is:An intense, multitasking lip treatment that smooths, relieves dryness, and preps for soft, dewy lips..Skincare Concerns:Dryness.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and phthalates. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Deliver visibly plumping hydration for soft and supple lips. This anytime, multitasking treatment instantly moisturizes, smooths, and preps lips for makeup. It is formulated with lip-loving ingredients like lipids, shea butter, and ceramides.
ingredients: Petrolatum, Polybutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pvp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Silica, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ppg-51/Smdi Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Ceramide Ng, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Sea Whip Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cholesterol, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C12-16 Alcohols, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Palmitic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer. ..Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to lips day and night. .-Use for an instant boost of hydration and for makeup prep. .-Can be used as an overnight mask or as a five-minute mask to condition lips before lipstick application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product and wear it everyday. It has really helped when my lips felt dry as well. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip balm I've ever tried. I live in cold climate and suffer from dry skin/lips in general so I have tried numerous lip balms in the past few years. This one has taken over as my holy grail product. It's so hudrating and has a lovely thick formula. There is a good amount of product especially as a little goes a long way. My advice is just to squeeze it out gently as to not put too much as a lot can come out at one time. It is easy to apply and is not sticky at all. It immediately soothes chapped lips and heals them, especially when used overnight. If you do not light thicker balms this may not be for you but you can sheer it out with your fingers. If you suffer from chronically dry lips please try this! The ingredients are all of quality and do not contain any potential drying agents or irritants like fragrances.  Holy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best ever lip treatment for dry lips and for winter. I have tried even more expensive ones. No other product can beat this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It does not plump your lips, but it does moisturize them wonderfully! ud83eude77ud83eude77ud83eude77ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i'm giving this 5 stars even though i would argue it doesn't u201cplumpu201d your lips. however its hands down the most moisturizing lip balm EVER. i put it in before bed and wake up with it on still! life saver.      overnight!! i put it on before bed and wake up and can still feel it on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm! I have been sick with super dry parched lips and nothing has been helping. One application of this and my lips are super hydrated soft and supple. I even woke up the next day after mouth breathing all night (stuffy nose) and my lips were still soft and plump. Very impressed!
My go too! I love this! Sephora stopped selling it in store and Im just cluing in now they have it online!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a present earlier this week and am amazed at how well it works.  I haven't had great luck with Clinique products in the past and am very happy with how well this lip balm works. I have very dry cracked lips and nothing else was working. Only complaint is that it is quite small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product I was gifted for Christmas I liked it and it was super hydrating  Recommend for dry lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't find that it's a plumper, but more so a good moisturizer for my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does leave your lips feeling moisturized but I don't think it's plumping my lips at all. I have dry sensitive lips that chap so easily and this product definitely is good for help your lips retain moisture but honestly it's just a higher end version of vaseline but in a tiny, tiny bottle. I'll still keep using mine since I spent so much money on it but definitely will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best lip balm I've ever used. And I've tried A LOOTTTTT. just trust me. But it. It's a winter coat staple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry lips and this has been one of the only things that have helped. after 2 days of using (I applied once in the morning and before sleeping), I already saw a huge difference. It works great underneath lip sticks too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip balm for super dry lips!! I find that it goes on well under any lipstick and last well after eating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only results I got were consistently dryer lips. My lips have been getting better with the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask and good ol' Vaseline but this product erases that once I use. Tossed it out. waste of money.   While it markets to be moisturizing, I should have clued in that it also has the word plumping which usually means it dries the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this. Makes your lips look plump and dewy. Great for day or for night. No scent whatsoever. Only downside is the packaging. It's pretty, but I hate a squeeze tube lip product. Wish it had a wand applicator. Still give it a 5/5 though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is just ok but not worth the price. Quite sticky and sat on top of lips, didn't sink in nicely or have that buttery feel. Not bad as a lip gloss but didn't find it overly moisturizing or comfortable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: after only one use I already feel the plumping effect. this is the best lip balm I have ever used. it is extremely hydrating and moisturizing. long lasting as well! will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_title: The perfect plumping gloss - sooo hydrating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This thing is seriously under hyped!! Plumping without the irritating tingle. Not sticky, yet extremely hydrating. LOVE!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip treatment that i have ever tried.  Healed my dry cracked lips and has a beautiful shine!

reviews.review_title: One of my new on the go must haves.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has a really nice plumping effect! I purchased this on a whim, just wanted to try something new, oh boy am I glad I picked this up! Firstly, it plumps my lips!! I don't usually wear anything lip plumping because I have sensitive skin but this product is gentle and it works, I feel a very slight tingling and then my lips look fuller. The formula is very nourishing and keeps my lips moisturized all day. I'm in love! I like how small this tube is, it's not bulky and the pink colour is just instant serotonin lol

reviews.review_title: the only lip balm you'll ever need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is amazing! it's really thick and lasts a long time. I can go 5-6 hours without needing to reapply. it's perfect for sensitive skin and it's one of the few products that doesn't sting or burn when I'm having an eczema flare-up. it's like a comforting hug for your lips. definitely worth a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally. Holy. Grail. Does not leave weird residue, ABSOLUTELY heals any lip sitU. Magic of worn overnightud83dudcafud83dude4cud83cudffbud83dude0c Yo welcome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with dry, chapped lips and this is the ONLY thing that works for me. I'm forever loyal to the Moisture Surge line by Clinique and this is just another top notch product from the line-up!

reviews.review_title: The only thing that actually works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried at least 7 lip moisturizers, treatments, and sleeping masks over the last year to try to tackle the dry vertical lines I have on my lips and this is hands down the only thing that works. It's actually unbelievable. Get this now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip balm as it recovers your lip from dry and chapped to wonderfully soft and supple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Clinique products so much, especially skincare. This item did more than I expected. It is so hydrating, easy to apply, and feels amazing. I love that there is no scent too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually do not splurge on basic items like lip balm, but this tube is so worth the price! I use it as an overnight lip mask and holy moly, my lips are so soft and moisturized the next morning! The moisture and associated plumping lasts for at least the full day, so it doesn't require frequent application for lips to stay soft. It is also not excessively shiny or slippery so it stays on my lips all night, even though I move around in my sleep. Overall a great, underrated product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it's the exact thing that I wanted for my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A must have! Soft and smooth w a touch of colour u2b50ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY GRAIL!!!!! I've never written a review before but for this product I HAD TOO! I'm obsessed with keeping my lips nice and moisturized - and I struggle with dry lips all the time. I've tried numerous products ranging from $5-$100 and this is my freaking favourite. I loved it so much I ordered two more asap! One for my vehicle, purse, nightstand! Love love love it's a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how much I like this lip balm. I have tried other balms with a Vaseline like consistency and they all dried my lips out. But this Clinique balm has no scent or flavor and doesn't dry out my lips. I like to use this before applying lip color or if I need extra moisture during the afternoon/evening. There's a different product from a different brand i prefer but this balm is a close second for day time wear. I prefer to use something heavier at night because my lips do get really dry. I would repurchase this balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't think i ll purchase this product again. It is so gooey and it actually doesn't worku2026 my lips are super dry and even though i ve been using this for the last 2 weeks, lips are still peeling off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels like Vaseline but with a Clinique price tag. It is a very thick formula and leaves your lips feeling like they have a gooey mask on. If my lips are cracked at all, when I put this product on, it only makes me feel the flaky dry skin even more. It does hydrate but not better than other, less expensive products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment feels good on my lips & it's smooth, not sticky. Good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A great product for leaving on overnight or for extra protection during the day. It stays on well and is a thicker consistency but not annoyingly sticky. Fragrance free so if you already have peeling lips this is the best option since fragrance is one of the biggest irritants. Packaging is nice since you can swipe it on vs putting your finger in a jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product but hate the applicator. It's hard to squeeze and control how much comes out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loooooooove this! It's the only thing that saves my lips from being dry and cracked or quickly repairs them when I rip them apart.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Helps my lips so much in the winter. One of my holy grail products for my lips and I've tried them all! Just wish it lasted a bit longer or came in a bigger size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got it during sale, but this thing surprises me. It works better than the la mer lip balm and way way cheaper! It makes your lip super soft another day!! I will def buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this religiously for well over a year every evening, and not only does it keep my lips moisturized, it also definitely has created a cute, little pout I had been losing as I'm getting a little older. Consistency is key with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many brands and my lips always went back to dry and peeling as soon as they wore off u2014 everything from EOS to Vaseline and even pricey brands too. This product does it all. Smoothes and heals dryness and lines for awesome lipstick application, gives lips a nice subtle fullness, isn't sticky, and has lasting effects! Used overnight as a lip treatment, you won't recognize your lips in the morning. Love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like using this I don't think it gives a plumping effect. You can also waste a little bit of product because it goes into the Cap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite lip product!!! Can't go a day without it.  Leaves your lips plump & not sticky at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I pick at my lips and honestly, they look a mess most of the time. But this lip balm is amazing! Completely restores my lips and stays on overnight as well as during the day. I was actually shocked at the results the first time I used it. I have tried everything and found nothing that works as well to heal my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is fantastic! I live in Colorado and normally have to reapply chapstick non stop every day.  But with this treatment, I apply once in the morning and I am set for the rest of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because I had a gift card and just needed something else to spend my money on and I was into lip plumpers at the time. When I received it I was bummed because it was more of a lip balm/ treatment as the name says. HOWEVER, now this is my go to lip balm for bed because my lips will stay hydrated all night and will stay be on the next morning. I don't use it during the day but I can only imagine how long wearing it would be if it lasts me all night. I definitely recommend for an overnight balm, even better than the laneige lip sleeping mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so hydrating and makes lips look so good. I will continuously purchase this lip balm. Every time I wear it I receive compliments about how good my lips look. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a lip mask at night, It's extremely hydrating and I wake up with it still on my lips. The weather has my skin so dry so my lips are always needing an extra boost of hydration and this product delivers! I do see lines in my lips smoothed out over continued use, but not too much on the u201cplumpingu201d aspect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish that they would take out u201cplumpu201d from the name of the product because it doesn't make your lips look fuller, but man oh man is this the best overnight lip treatment I have tried. It's very thick, lasts all night, and it's still on by the next morning. Better than other high end lip masks I have tried, this has become my holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in the Mini Lip Loving Trio Set, it's a lip gloss with no smell. Nothing wrong with it but not worth its price. There's nothing special about it, no plumping effect either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Keeps my lips soft during the cold, hard winters. I don't see a plumping effect, but it seems to make my lips look more supple the following morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like to use this as a sleeping mask for my lips. I wake up and It's still there in the morning. No overnight chapped lips, and the condition of my lips in general has improved over the last month or so since I started using it.  I haven't noticed any real plumping, other than my lips just being hydrated and smooth.

reviews.review_title: not the dramatic plump; very subtle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. Little sticky at first but once massaged in it's all good. Lasts a lot longer than most lip balms I've tried even with a mask on at work all day including the cheap and more expensive than this! The plumping effect is minimal; if looking for the dramatic noticeable plumper this isn't it. This also goes well with the rest of the moisture surge line up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are always dry and chapped and I'm always on the hunt for lip balms that work. My lips are also very sensitive and most of the time, they don't react well to lip balms. The only products that have worked for me are Vaseline and this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this product would have the tingly effect that other lip pumping products I've tried, have. However this product does not..which would not be a bad thing if it did plump because then it would have all the benefits without the weird tingly feeling. But this product has neither. It is just an over-priced lip gloss. Honestly, I would prefer to just put on some Vaseline to this. Not a fan. Two stars because it does give some moisture but so would a pharmacy lip gloss/chapstick -or Vaseline like I mentioned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Clinque Moisture Surge line but this lip treatment is too sticky for me to enjoy.  I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. For the past few months my lips were dry and chapped. I tried other lip balms and some home remedies and all I got was just temporary relief. With this product my lips are now smooth, plump and look very healthy (I actually don't need to put on lipstick/gloss).    Tip: at first, the product feels sticky, but once you massage it in, the stickiness goes away. I like to use the head of the container (because it is round and smooth) to distribute and massage the product on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip product lives in my bag rent free! It was recommended to me by a Sephora employee - I love using it as base for my nude lip looks. It's glossy, hydrating and nourishing !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love!! It feels amazing on your lips, and gives them such a pretty shine WITHOUT being sticky! I'm super picky about that cause I have long hair, and no one wants their hair being stuck on their lips!! It moisturizes, and makes your pout look plump, and pretty. I would definitely recommend, and will for sure be buying more when I'm out. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! It's super hydrating and gives your lips a naturally plumped look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it didn't do much and was uncomfortable on the lips. I may also note that it was kind of sticky? This is expensive and it's not worth it at all just drive yourself to CVS.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It is so thick and is able to quench my overly chapped lips. If they sold this in a gallon sized container I'd be the first one to buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product for the moisturizing benifits, the plump wasn't a big draw for me. I have to say that it has been amazing for the Canadian winter that it Ontario. I've recommended it to a few people posting on instagram about their dry peeling lips and they've written back thanking me. Yes the price point is higher than the average lip balm but this is for heavy duty care. I'm almost done my first tube and will be repurchasing. It is a thicker application than you're used to applying but I always make sure to use a bit before walking the dog and before bed. In the morning I wake up with smooth hydrated lips. I'll give this 5 stars because $25 is a small price to pay when nothing else works for your dry chapped lips. My lips do still get dry sometimes but I just apply some of this and problem solved. Dry lips are no longer an ongoing issue for me thanks to this product.

reviews.review_title: this works for very sensitive lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I've tried almost everything Sephora has to offer and nothing compares to this. I'm not thrilled about the price point, but it's the only thing that works anymore. I have very sensitive lips and everything either didn't moisturize well enough or made my lips peel too much. The last thing I tried for example was the Ilia lip mask (?) that comes in a little jar. It didn't penetrate and made my lips peel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally just Vaseline in a fancy tube. Not worth the price at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews I had very high expectations when I purchased this product. It's a good product, but I'm not sure I'd re-purchase at this price point. It moisturizes my lips well, but I've just personally found other products that work just as well if not better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Winter must have!! A little goes a long way. I bought it more for the moisture surge than the plump treatment but I the plumping is only slight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been suffering from serious winter chapped lips. Even carmex stopped working! I received a sample in the last Clinique GWP and now IM OBSESSED. This will make the SECOND full size tube I have purchased in 2 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY lip treatment that works for my dry, peeling, chapped lips. And once this treats them, they no longer get chapped and peel. If you've tried a million products out there with no success, then try no more! You've found the holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in LOVE with this stuff!!! It's a little pricey for lip balm, but I bought two just because it's THAT good! One for my purse and one for my nightstand :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this product is flavorless. I don't see any noticeable plumping, but it is very moisturizing and stays on my lips a long time even when eating and drinking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay, I didn't find anything special about it that would make it stand out from all the thousands of lip products out there. It's hydrating initially but it dries out pretty quickly and I didn't see any visible plumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For hydration, you can't lose.  I use this daily carrying it in my purse, jacket pocket, etc. to always have handy.  Particularly important to me during these winter months.  However, it does nothing in regards to plumping my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great long lasting. I recommend this lip treatment for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really great for needing a boost of moisture however does not help with reoccurring dry lips. I needed to reuse often as it dried up pretty quick. Other than that, it looks great and has no tint which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer this to MAC's lip balm, which I used to think was excellent. With no odd taste or smell, this balm just does its job. It's highly moisturizing and lasts well. It's part of my nighttime and morning routine and I can't do without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip treatment I've ever used! I use it before bed and wake up with hydrated and supple lips. Canadian winters can be very cold and dry, this is a must buy! Very underrated product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this stuff, but the reviews had me curious so I tried it. I AM SO GLAD I DID. It's thick enough to feel moisturizing, but not enough to be all sticky. It has a really smooth texture that leaves my usually very chapped lips feeling soothed and soft. I'm curious to see how long it lasts because it is a pretty small tube, but I'm hopeful that it lasts long enough to make it worth the price. (I haven't noticed any lip-plumping, but I didn't really care about that when I purchased it.) It doesn't have a scent or a taste, which is a bonus for me, especially since it has a light Vaseline-y consistency (without feeling gross like Vaseline does IMO). The applicator is rounded, which I wasn't crazy about at first, but it does help spread the product over your lips without leaving any behind, wasting less product (which is always a bonus). I think found a new favorite lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's pretty thick and gives me that gloss look but it feels too heavy it doesn't absorb into my lips. Makes my lips feel more dry when the product wears off. Not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a great moisturizer! It last for a couple of hours & a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm feels lovely on, very hydrating and has a very light (emphasis on light) plumping effect. It's not like a traditional plumper that stings, and causes plumping due to irritation. This makes my lips look juicy, and more youthful. Not sticky, smooths lip lines a bit, and has a decent amount of staying power. I actually prefer this to by terry baume de rose. Love that it's unscented, like most of clinique a products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There was no plumping at all. This is similar to regular chapstick. I returned it and would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am addicted to chapstick and lip balm. Get freaked out if I don't have a chapstick in my pocket at all times. I have actually turned around and driven back home if I forget one.   Until this little lover became my new addiction. I used to apply chapstick every few hours or more. Now? Once in the morning, once after lunch and once before bed. It. Is. AMAZING. Now I order it 3 at a time and have it on each floor of my house, because.... who goes out anymore? It's just me and my lip lover and that's just fine with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip balm in existence. Are used to live in extremely dry city in Canada meaning it is very cold as well which is the worst environment for skin. I tried everything, this is the best. Better than Laneige, Fresh, Jack Black, Bite, Drunk Elephant's Lippe Balm, Chapstick, Vaseline, Carmex etc.  Love that it is unscented to boot. Has no color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only lip treatment that hasn't made my lips worse after use! I use it every night before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE and will be buying again when I run out. I have been using this for a couple months now and I'm about to run out for the first time. This stuff last on your lips for a whillllle which I love!!! It doesn't have a tingling feel but I do feel like it adds a little plumping to my lips over time. It has also help improve the outline of my lips become more solid.

reviews.review_title: The real deal to beat dry!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a gift sample of this and forgot I had it, until my mom wound up in hospital after a stroke. Her lips were big patches of cracked and scabby skin, and I applied this lip treatment after finding it in the bottom of my purse. Within three days of that first application, all the dry spots and scabs were eliminated. I bought her a tube to useu2014it brought some comfort to her during a very uncomfortable time. Thanks Clinique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Clinique's lip repairware for years but thought I'd give this moisture surge one a try.  I was a little disappointed!  This feels heavy and oily on the lips as if I just ate some greasy fried chicken.  I prefer the laneige lip mask instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who always has dry lips, this product has done wonders for me. I use this at night and wake up with super soft, smooth lips. Whenever I use this I normally only have to use lip balm once a day opposed to almost every few hours when I don't use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FAVORITE. My absolute favorite lip product ever. I've least been a chapstick person-had tons of different kinds from different brands. I tried this and have been instantly obsessed. On my fourth tube. It stays on well and makes your lips feel so soft! Perfect lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product for around a year now, a little goes a LONG WAY. Everytime I put this one (either at night or during the day) I get compliments and people have even asked me if I get my lips done!!!! I hope they never stop making this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free gift with a clinique purchase, and I am amazed at how well it works. It definitely feels sticky, almost sticker than a lip gloss, but I typically only use it before I go to bed or if I'm not planning on going out anywhere. I don't think it would be horrible to wear out though-- it just feels quite sticky. It's extremely moisturizing and plumping, and I don't feel like it dries out my lips after using it, so you don't need a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this lip balm!  I put it on my lips at night, and it's still there in the morning.  It has incredible staying power.  Unflavoured and unscented, this heals, protects and moisturizes lips like nothing else I've ever tried.  You NEED this in your stash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved it ! I will definitely purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using this product a couple of days and I already notice a huge difference. I applied some over night and after waking and washing my face I noticed my lips were super stuff and moisturized and I hadn't even applied any to my lips yet. So far my only complaint is the cost in relation to the tiny tube. Probably would still purchase again unless I find something similar for a better price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Utra-efficace, il vient u00e0 bout des levres les plus gercees. Legerement brillant et pas collant du tout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved it ! I will definitely purchase it again !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this product. I have chronic dry/peeling lips that nothing ever seems to work on. I put this on at night before bed and it has completely changed my lips. They are super hydrated and plump- no more cracking and peeling. It is thick and doesn't require much product when applying. If you're looking for something lightweight I wouldn't recommend this- it has the consistency of 90's thick lipgloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly it takes a really good product for me to write a review. This right here, did wonders for me!!! I had really chapped lips. So tried a hundred lip balm(moisturizers) $-$$$. I have not had luck with any of them. Just 3 days of this moisturizer, my lips are softer and healthier than ever! I LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had super chapped lips and went through a variety of products trying a fix. This product did not help my chapped lips and is quite pricey.

reviews.review_title: Don't ever get rid of this lip balm, Clinique.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip balm and they took it out of my local Sephora so I thought it was discontinued. I was SO ecstatic to find it here online still so I'm definitely going to be buying these up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ran out of this half way through my Accutane course and my lips literally went raw and cracked at the corners after a week of using some back up stuff (Lanolips, Aquaphor, Vaseline, Fenty, etc) - at one point my bottom lip cracked right in the middle and I'm pretty sure I saw some lip filler ooze out !! Even though I'm done Accutane now I still use and love it. I always have at least 3 back ups of this stocked up in case it ever goes out of stock. It's petroleum based but thicker and gloss-ier than Vaseline. I can apply a thick layer without it slipping everywhere. I use this every morning and night and throughout the day. Has no taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty sub par lip balm. A treatment it is not. The much cheaper Jack Black balm is better, and although it's not my staple, I do think it's the best non-tinted balm at Sephora. My favorite balms aren't sold at Sephora, so I'll leave my review at that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand the hype around this product.  It does no more or less than half a dozen other brands I can think of.   It moisturizes well enough (had better), and does not offer any plumping action.

reviews.review_title: You either like it or you don't
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a truly believer of this product and of Clinique, PERIODT. I have used other lip balms brands and none of them can compare to this one. I am a certified Clinique Skincare Consultant and I can tell you that, is a product that either works for you or doesn't or you just simply don't like it. However, I have seen it work miracles on some of clients and myself included as well. The price its  a little  unnecessary,  but the product is worth it. As Clinique  Consultants we do give free samples( obviously  not now due to the circumstances)so just ask for a sample of the product and try it out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment definitely softens your lips and locks in moisture, but it's not a plumper.  It's a little sticky, but it lasts a long time. I use it overnight as my lips are really dry, and this helps.I wake up with soft, smooth lips. I like the applicator style - no need for using my fingertips!   This would be great when you're congested and breathe through your mouth a night; it would def keep your lips moist! (I normally use vaseline :|)  Same with super cold days (yay Canadian winter).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Would not purchase this again. Product is sticky and uncomfortable, and does not deliver as promised. Well overpriced!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This doesn't plump AT ALL. It's no better than Carmex or regular chapstick, just in a cute tube. Total waste of money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip treatment definitely softens your lips, locks in moisture, but it's not a plumper. I don't think it's got the right name. Clinique could have used plump in marketing copy perhaps, but it's an excellent moisturizing treatment. I use many products from the Moisture Surge line, and this doesn't disappoint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a little sticky, but it stays on forever! Reminds me a lot of Jouer's enhancing lip balm, which I love. Definitely hydrates and doesn't make my lips feel dry, cracked, or tight at all!

reviews.review_title: A must buy if you love liquid lipsticks and matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is completely worth it!  This lip treatment heals dry & cracked lips overnight even if you wear liquid lipstick and matte lipsticks everyday.

reviews.review_title: Another Awesome Lip Treatment From Clinique
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a huge fan of Clinique Lip Treatments in the past so I decided to give this a try as well, and this is another fave now! It's less shiny than the Superbalm, and also less sticky, while being moisturizing and long lasting. I will forever have a tube of this is my lip treatment stash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Clinique, but this lip treatment is just ok.  It doesn't really last very long, doesn't really feel like it is adding hydration to my lips, and it's a bit tacky (in the worst way).  I like the applicator style -- no need for using my fingertips!  I also really like that, if you want to use as an everyday lip therapy, you can just squeeze out small amounts, smack your lips together a bit and you have a nice light sheen to them (not quite a gloss, but shinier than a balm).  So, I wasn't so underwhelmed that I returned this product, but it isn't in my everyday rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had really dry lips for a while now and I think have tried almost every brand on the market. Biossance, Blistex, Laneige, Bite Beauty, just to name a few... Nothing worked as well as this. I love how there is no fragrance which is the best thing when your lips are already irritated and dry. In general, fragrance in skincare is unnecessary, but it's ESPECIALLY bad if you have sensitive skin. It will just irritate your lips even more. Keep in mind, everyone's skin is different. However, I recommend trying this because there's a good chance it will work for you if it worked for me after trying so many different lip products. I've been using this for a while now and my lips rarely ever get chapped, and if they do, I use a lip scrub (GENTLY) to remove the dead skin and then apply this product. It works amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am the lip plumper/mask/treatment queen. Self proclaimed...of course ;) Anyways...i love this stuff.  when i first saw it, i wont lie...i thought i got ripped off because it's in your same tube and same consistancy of the vaseline tubes of lip balm.  I tried it anyways. Let me tell you.. it is so nourishing that I feel my lips do look fuller because the lines are plumped up and the flakiness is gone. I really like it. Also it's not sticky..no bad taste or smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Im in healthcare and I find my lips get so dry! This is the best bang for your buck! Yes a little pricey but so worth it.

reviews.review_title: Really great vegan lip balm option
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't want to like it because it's pretty pricey for a lip balm, but boy do I love it. Like other reviews say, it's a great night time balm, but I also use it during the day frequently as it's not too heavy. It lasts a lot longer than you'd expect. I've used it on and off for about 8 months now, and I'm only just now finishing my first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the BEST but pretty darn close! For me a product has to be absolutely amazing to get 5stars. This is great for putting on lips right before bedtime. I wake up with soft, moisturized lips. It doesn't stink which is a plus because I'm sensitive to fragrances. I will continue to purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pretty moisturizing and does the job. If you need a good lip balm, this is it. My only complaint would be the applicator. Not a fan of these styles of lip balms where the tip is rounded with a little hole at the tip. I wish it was more flat or angled so it could lay flush against the lips (if that makes sense).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product goes on thick and stays there. I put it on at night and wake up with my lips soft and slightly plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a mini size. I love it. It's thick but not sticky. I  use it as a nighttime lip mask. When I wake up I still have it on my lips. Leaves my lips smooth.I would definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little magic tube! I'm on my second and it's the only thing that keeps my lips from falling off in the dry Colorado winter! So glad I found it! wayyyyy better than the laniege and agave lip mask, I've tried them all and this is a keeper. PS - Clinique, maybe a colored version for daytime? I would love this in pink or nude!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay. Is it better than the original one that they discontinued? NOOO! I wish they would bring the original back because it did wonders for me. I just use this one because it's slightly better than others on market that I've tried (and I've tried a lot: from high end to low end). I did notice it does not stay on my lips as long as the original, it is not as thick (bummer), and my lips would become dry by the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously the ONLY lip chap that I can use!!!! Waaay better than even Vaseline! I live in Canada and I am a nurse - working in the hospital for 13 hrs a day makes my lips so so chapped and Canadian winters don't help my lips either! I recommend this to anyone! So worth it - I've bought so many!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't have high expectations for this (despite loving the moisture surge moisturizer) but was delighted that I was wrong! This balm works really well and helped my dry lips a ton! I usually get drop lips when I'm dehydrated which happens way more often than I wish it would. I use it at night and it seems to work well through at least part of the next day. I would highly recommend this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to give this a good review, as I had high hopes for the product. I'd apply it twice daily, sometimes more if needed, and it looked like a gloss yet felt like a protective barrier for my lips. However, within a week of using this product I started to develop sores on my lip. I've never had sores on my lips before. I wanted to give the product the benefit of the doubt and kept using it, and it would just make the sores worse. When I didn't use the product, my lips would feel drier than they did before. I really wanted to love this product, but sadly it had a negative outcome on me. Be careful! My sores are currently healing since I've been off the product for a couple of days now. The laneige sleeping mask and lip balms wear away quicker, but they are a lot safer than this product and give me no side effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I was on acne meds, I went through a phase of horrible lip peeling and dryness. The (massively overpriced) Rodan and Fields lip capsules were the only thing that helped. When they changed the formula, I happily landed on this - a fraction of the price, and just as effective. Wake up with plump, hydrated lips. Works as a heavier balm/gloss during the day too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a nice product . Clear lip balm to use it at night time is a go for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a whim purchase and my expectations were very low. However I was so wrong! This is so nourishing and makes my lips so soft! The consistency is a little thick almost like vaseline. It does last a long time without the need to reapply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating lip balm that gives a slight, temporary tingle and plumping effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing balm that actually heals my dry lips. It has ceramides and cholesterol in it too which is super rare for lip balms for some reason. The texture is thick but smooth, and it's slightly glossy looking on the lips. It lasts HOURS and I don't need to reapply it unless I eat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this mask, i have really dry skin and the mask is the best balm/lip mask i've ever used, i'm definitely going to buy another one once mine is used up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I loved this lip balm, tube is so cute, balm is similar to vaseline but softer and I really liked it, but today - just week after I started using it, there is plasticky strange smell so I can't use it any more. It's really shame :(.

reviews.review_title: so underrated, the best out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great, I don't know why nobody is talking about this. Yes, it doesn't have the fancy fragrances but that's the point, fragrances in lip balms are terrible for chapped lips. I have terrible chapped lips, my house is very dry and this is one of the best if not the best lip balm or lip mask I have found. The packaging is cute. It's not irritating or addictive, it works. I hesitated a long time because I used to be allergic to Clinique's lip products years ago, I react to lots of products, this one isn't one of them. Go run and get it. PS, I've tried pretty much all of the balms at Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: u2b50ufe0fI've tried hundreds of lip products and this is my FAVORITE! Hope they never stop making this lip balm. It is very moisturizing and nothing else makes the texture of my lips as smooth as this... Holy grail. Unscented, goes on clear and makes your lips look healthy and plumpu2b50ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: STOP SEARCHING! I have chronically very dehydrated, flaky lips, due to genetics and also the climate I live in.  I have tried 'everything' that is supposed to be amazing, all the hyped up brands and several of the luxury balms. Nothing comes close to this.  I've been using this for about 2 years and I have purchased at least 5- I need them in my purse, coat pocket, several rooms of the house... Applying is the last thing I do before laying down to sleep at night. This always makes my lips feel amazing!

reviews.review_title: favorite lip mask only need to use once a day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip mask. It doesn't irritate my lips and I only need to put it on at night and it keeps my lips in good shape to wear lip stains and lipsticks throughout the week. Sometimes with products like this my lips end up rejecting it eventually but I've had no problems with the clique lip masks. No other lipbalm needed with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just a repackaged and slightly more expensive Pep Start overnight lip mask which is my holy grail. No other lip balm or product has helped my lips so much. I am a little disappointed that it's more expensive now and a little smaller. I also don't find it to be plumping but in terms of hydration this is unbeatable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This soothes my chapped lips in only 2 days and doesn't cause breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a good lip treatment forever now. I have tried pretty much everything! I got this because the reviews were going crazy over this product! Honestly, I don't understand what the hype is? It doesn't plump at all, and it doesn't hydrate any better than any other chapstick/lip balm. Its pretty much just a lip gloss. Not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried everything to cure my bone dry lips. This is now all I have used for 2 years. Cannot live without it. Buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible product. I purchased over 6 highly rated lip moisturizers including Sugar, Laniege, etc. This is by and far the best. Also, looks beautiful, not too thin or thick, and leaves lips super moisturized and plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is very thick and it feels waxy when applied.  I was hoping it would be very hydrating, given the name, but it's just an overpriced vaseline.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip balm. Super hydrating. I like balms that really feel thick and like a barrier. This is perfect for over night. I have super dry lips and this seems to really be helping. Highly recommend if you're looking for something like a mask. If you want something thin, this is not it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was tired of spending money literally week after week searching for something that worked for me because all the previous lip balms/lip masks did not. My lips were severely damaged and cracked, but once I put this on my lips, I immediately felt the u201cmoisture surgeu201d from the product. I used this along with my First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Intensive Lip Balm and now my lips are in much better shape. This is good as a lip mask, regular daily use, or lip prep for lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the same thing as the Pep-start night mask one. It was just reintroduced under a new line. It works just as great! I'm on my third one (this is the first one I bought from the new line) and I haven't noticed a difference which I love. My lips are always chapped and this makes a huge difference! It does everything it claims to do. It's so thick and moisturizing, but you don't feel anything on your lips. It doesn't have a scent. As someone mentioned, it isn't sticky it is more on the gooey side. It's so worth it. Also, these last me a long time and I apply it throughout the day multiple times.  It's pricey if you're used to just purchasing regular lip treatments but I swear it's life changing. I almost held off on buying this the first time bc I had doubts specially because of the price point but it's definitely worth it and makes a huge difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of those products I must always keep on stock. It isn't an instant results product but 100% will give you noticeable improvement over time. My lips look so much softer, plumper and pinker like I'm wearing lip gloss first thing in the morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this but I find you have to use alot of it for it to have any effects and then its like I didn't put it on at all after an hour. I do LOVE it for that hour though.. I wish the applicator wasn't round too. A slanted or curved tip would make it easier to apply without loosing product. I think I will go back to the laneige sleeping mask after this is used up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good moisturizer and not too fragrant. Just does it's job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product right when it came out because I was so looking forward to a super hydrating, plumping lip balm. This product is very sloppy to apply, because the texture of the balm is similar to vaseline, but I don't really mind that. It also has an odd smell, but nothing overpowering or annoying.  Altogether, I apply this lip balm once or twice during the day and my lips stay totally hydrated. There is no plumping affect, but I don't believe the product was intended to be like the TwoFaced Lip Injection lip plumper. If you want something to mainly plump your lips, this isn't the product for you. If you're looking for a super hydrating, longlasting lip balm, this is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a huge fan of this product.  It is very hydrating but as for plumping of the lips, it doesn't hasn't done anything noticeable.  It also smells strange too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super-moisturizing treatment that I will buy again and again! I've always been a buyer of Clinique, but I was looking for a new lip treatment and thought I'd give it a try. Glad I did and right after my order it sold out! Smoothing and plumping. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sumptuous balm... happy I bought this, though I baked at the price, this takes lip moisturizing up a notch. After a very busy summer with lots of outdoor time, I noticed how dry my lips were and pronounced pucker lines on my top lip. Two days of applying this product and I already feel a difference.  My parched lips heaved a sigh of relief!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail. I struggled with dry crack lips for years. after years of trial and error i finally found this one that truly the only one that fixed my dry cracked lips, on top of that i can put lipstick on without drying my lips all day. i only had to apply twice (am&before going to bed) to keep my lips hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, I'm not usually one for lip products but this is a must have! It keeps my lips hydrated all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A Clinique employee told me this product is the exact same as the now discontinued Pep Start Pout Restoring Night Lip Mask. Same ingredients and packaging, they just changed which line it's in (Pep Start vs moisture surge).  This is my holy grail product that I cannot live without. I'm rouge because I spend all my money on skincare but if I could only have one product for the rest of my life this would be it!  It's a wonderful lip treatment and can be worn day and/or night. It isn't sticky, more so gooey but in a wonderful way! Can't recommend this product enough 10/10
